Reviews.Title: “Secret pearl in the centre of Rome”
Reviews.Author: Dimitiri_Netherlands
Reviews.Content: looking peaceful comfortable inexpensive centre rome definitively stay hotel centro spent weekend enjoyed beautiful green park hotel building warm hospitality hotel management simple comfort hotel facility park car free highly recommended
